tool_description: Creates automated reminder schedules for non-respondents with customizable timing, frequency, and escalation rules to optimize response rates without over-communication.

max_reminders_per_participant.description: Maximum number of reminders per participant

escalation_enabled.description: Whether to escalate reminder urgency over time

business_hours_only.description: Whether to send reminders only during business hours

exclude_weekends.description: Whether to exclude weekends from reminder scheduling

error_messages: Invalid survey_id: Survey ID must be a non-empty string.
Invalid reminder_intervals: Intervals must be positive integers between 1 and 720 hours.
Unsupported channel: Supported reminder channels are [email, sms, push_notification, phone_call].
Invalid max_reminders_per_participant: Must be between 1 and 10.
Invalid timezone: Use standard timezone identifiers (e.g., 'UTC', 'America/New_York').
usage: Provide survey_id, reminder_intervals, and channels. Configure timing preferences with max_reminders_per_participant, business_hours_only, timezone, and exclude_weekends. Returns scheduled reminder plan.

schedule_id.description: Unique identifier for the reminder schedule
